https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8cj0Q2uFfpTkCw4gMqqcTBpdoqF.jpg This is a story of a man in free fall. On the road to redemption, darkness lights his way. Connected with the afterlife, Uxbal is a tragic hero and father of two who's sensing the danger of death. He struggles with a tainted reality and a fate that works against him in order to forgive, for love, and forever. Biutiful
